GSD.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v4.19.238
GSD.description:
lib/test: use after free in register_test_dev_kmod()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 46012ed6a533431d004fe76162faf05a60fae975, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit d9c6a72d6fa29d3a7999dda726577e5d1fccafa5. For more details please see the references link.
